text:
@realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden reacts as US coronavirus death toll surpasses 100,000.

“I know from experience, the day will come when the memory of your loved one will bring a smile to your lips before it brings a tear to your eye.”

#Leadeship #Humanity

https://t.co/jTr10dYRRA
